Class UserLogin

java.lang.Object
org.CSPT.sc2001_grp1_proj1.UserLogin
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin
public class UserLogin extends Object
Class for managing user login, password management, and authentication. Handles login, password reset, and password change functionalities for users.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserLogin

      public UserLogin(HashMap<String,String> validUsersLogin, HashMap<String,Users> validUsers)
      Constructor for initializing UserLogin with valid user credentials and details.
      Parameters:
      validUsersLogin - A HashMap containing valid usernames and passwords.
      validUsers - A HashMap containing valid user details mapped by username.

  • Method Details

    • loginMenu

      public Users loginMenu(Scanner scanner)
      Displays the login menu and handles user authentication.
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      Returns:
      A Users object representing the successfully logged-in user, or null if login fails.

    • forgotPassword

      public void forgotPassword(Scanner scanner)
      Handles the process for resetting a forgotten password.
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner object for reading user input.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(Scanner scanner, String username)
      Allows the user to change their password after login or when required.
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      username - The username of the user whose password is being changed.

    • getLoginUserID

      public static String getLoginUserID()
      Retrieves the hospital ID of the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      A string representing the hospital ID of the logged-in user.
